entry.title: special treatment
entry.summary:
Author: last_honey

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,771Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck is not jealous of the newfound partnership between Eddie and Hen. He’s totally capable of being normal about it and sees absolutely zero reason to do anything about said partnership, nor does he expect Eddie to do anything about it, either. (But, like, if Eddie did want to do something to him about it, then sure, he’s as jealous as humanly possible. Sue him.)

entry.title: He loves Eddie
entry.summary:
Author: eddiesarms

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,099Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: "What's wrong?” She’s sneaking not so subtle glances in his direction, waiting for Buck to speak about whatever is bothering him. He's willing his mouth to open and talk but no sound comes out. “Is it Bobby?” Maddie’s voice pulls him out from his trance. “No, no it’s not Bobby.” Buck shakes his head and fixes his posture for a few seconds and then goes back to slouching on the counter. “So it is something.” “I mean… It’s not Bobby but it is, it’s always Bobby these days.”__Post-episode s09e01: Buck and Maddie talk

Author: maddies118

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,198Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 141

Summary: “I love him, you know.” Eddie froze as Buck’s voice crackled over the speaker and a pit formed in his stomach, icy cold and unpleasant. Buck loved someone. entry.title: [Podfic] all dressed up (with somewhere to go)
entry.summary:
Author: 42donotpod (42donotpanic)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: “Hey,” Buck grinned when he reached Spider-man, grabbing him by the wrist to turn him around. He peeled the mask up just enough to kiss him. That was weird too, he’d never had to lean down to kiss Tommy before, even if it was only by an inch. Maybe the boots Buck was wearing had a bigger sole than he’d realized.The kiss didn’t feel like Tommy either, his lips were softer and fuller than usual, but Buck chalked that up to the tequila. It was a good kiss though, that was the thing. It was a great kiss. He didn’t want to stop kissing him and actually, he didn’t have to. Buck wrapped his arms around him and deepened the kiss, groaning just a little when he felt Tommy wrap his arms around Buck too.“Evan?”Podfic of all dressed up (with somewhere to go) by 42hrb.

entry.title: Between Heaven and Hell: Buck’s Desire
entry.summary:
Author: caarmeeem

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,644Chapters: 39/?Kudos: 121

Summary: Evan Buckley was never supposed to be born only as a “savior baby.”What no one knew was that, in their desperation to save Daniel, Phillip and Margaret turned to Lucifer Morningstar. A pact was sealed, but the debt was never paid. Now, years later, Buck carries not only the pain of failing to save his brother, but also the inheritance of a father who doesn’t belong to this world. Raised by Lucifer himself, Buck grows up among angels, demons, and humans, bearing the gift of hearing people’s deepest desires. By his sister Maddie’s side—the only part of the Buckley family who truly loves him—he finds the strength to keep following his own path. When he chooses to become a firefighter, fate intertwines him with Eddie Díaz—a deconstructed Catholic, single father, and the only person capable of making Buck believe that love can be greater than any dark legacy.

Author: rainny_days

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,116Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 71

Summary: Don’t say anything about missing Eddie, he thinks as he chops veggies to hide in Bobby’s ragu sauce. Don’t say anything about wanting him and Christopher back. Don’t say anything about El Paso, or facetime calls, or any feelings. “I think Eddie and Chris are haunting my kitchen,” Buck blurts out.In 2025, Evan Buckley is living at 4335 South Bedford Street and missing his Diaz boys. To compensate, he starts cooking. In 2017, new firefighter academy recruit Eddie Diaz is starting to believe his son when he says that their new house comes with its very own kitchen ghost. In every time, there is a kitchen, food for three, and love, and love, and love.

entry.title: 5 Minutes to Life
entry.summary:
Author: lexaproeddie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,142Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 112

Summary: Dating was not Eddie’s forté. It was always awkward, painful, and never fun. He was always left counting down the minutes until it was appropriate to go home. Dates always felt like his skin was too tight, and his tongue was too fat to let any real air in. It felt like he was on stage performing a pitchy rendition of Somebody to Love. But as Eddie emerged from the bedroom and caught a glimpse of Buck in the living room rolling up his sleeves; it was almost worth it.Ravi ropes Buck into speed dating and then Buck ropes Eddie into it. Eddie hates dating, but he'd do just about anything for Buck. Naturally they get paired and one thing leads to another and they end up fucking nasty.
